Title: Synthesis of Boronocysteine
Abstract: © Georg Thieme Verlag Stuttgart New York.Herein we report the first synthesis of protected boronocysteine. The target compound was prepared via copper-catalysed diastereoselective nucleophilic borylation of a sulfinimine. After deprotection to give the amine as the hydrochloride salt, four boronocysteine amide derivatives were prepared through reaction with a variety of different active acylating agents.
